DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate effectiveness steroid injection immobilization versus immobilization treat patient lateral epicondylitis .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Steroid Injection Treating Patients With Lateral Epicondylitis
DOC.criteria: age 18 65 year confirm lateral epicondylitis receive treatment prior enrolment symptom last less 6 week history acute trauma , fracture , and/or surgery within 12 month patient receive corticosteroid injection , physiotherapy , splint casting past 6 month bilateral involvement history cervical disk herniation , radiculopathy abnormal electrophysiologic study
